#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType HoleQualificationUSGA.

== Name ==

*[CHoleQualificationUSGA HoleQualificationUSGA]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--HoleQualificationUSGA (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Qualify a golf course played from a set of tees according to the USGA rules.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...>  ([SCourseRating rating] ; [SCourseSlope slope]) </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [SCourseRating golfml:CourseRating] || [SCourseRating rating] ||  					Course rating of a set of tees according to USGA specifications.				 ||
|| [SCourseSlope golfml:CourseSlope] || [SCourseSlope slope] ||  					Slope of a set of tees according to USGA specifications.				 ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CHoleQualification HoleQualification]
----
    <xs:complexType name="HoleQualificationUSGA">  <xs:all>    <xs:element name="rating" type="golfml:CourseRating">    </xs:element>    <xs:element name="slope" type="golfml:CourseSlope">    </xs:element>  </xs:all></xs:complexType>
----
